snippet: The N.B.A. on Wednesday released its schedule, which begins on Oct. 28 with the San Antonio Spurs hosting the Dallas Mavericks in one of three games.
abstract: National Basketball Assn releases its schedule for regular season, which features lengthened All-Star break; LeBron James will play his first game since rejoining Cleveland Cavaliers at home on Oct 30 against the New York Knicks.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. on Wednesday released its schedule, which begins on Oct. 28 with the San Antonio Spurs hosting the Dallas Mavericks in one of three games.

headline.main: LeBron James and Cavs Open vs. Knicks
headline.print_headline: James and Cavs Open vs. Knicks
